entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bmi2.X64_r failed with Could not load file or assembly 'C:\h\w\BA7A09DC\p\system.runtime.interopservices.dll'. Invalid access to memory location. (0x800703E6) #66484
  • Transient services implementing IDisposable cause a memory leak #66483
  • Loading .NET host via hostfxr process crashes with Fatal error. Failed to load JIT compiler #66475
  • IStructuralEquatable.Equals on array throws for multidimensional arrays #66472
  • [API Proposal]: Uri from interpolated string #66470
  • System.Text.Json.Tests crashing from `Debug.Assert` in `JsonSerializerOptions.GetJsonTypeInfoFromContextOrCreate` #66469
  • [API Proposal]: Expose xarch serialize instruction. #66467
  • Consolidate sync/async JsonSerializer test abstractions into single type and expand async coverage for reference handler feature #66463
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Make AOT build produce equal binaries on windows and mac #66461
    7.0.0
  • Yum mirror for EL7 (https://packages.microsoft.com/rhel/7/prod/) has incorrect metadata. #66459
  • Updating to the latest DF build (17.0.0 Preview 5 31801.437.main) results in broken .NET Core 3.1 component #66456
  • [API Proposal]: `Math.Percentile(double[] sequence, double percentile)` #66454
  • [API proposal]: add ProcessStartInfo constructor that accepts IEnumerable<string> arguments. #66450
  • GZipStream doesn't write anything to the target stream when there was no write operation #66449
  • [API Proposal]: Ensure configuration secrets come from appropriate provider (e.g. key secret provider) #66448
  • Setting SlidingExpiration on a CacheEntry has some seemingly undocumented behavior #66445
  • Test failure JIT\\jit64\\opt\\osr\\osr001\\osr001.cmd #66441
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector128/Vector128_ro/Vector128_ro.sh #66439
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_ToStream<MyEventsListerViewModel> #66464
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_RandomAccess #66465
  • .Netcore 3.1 Error using PasswordDeriveBytes.CryptDeriveKey #66460
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add readonly Capacity property to HashSet<T> and Dictionary<K,V> #66426
  • Test failure System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.WriteValueTests.CanWriteValueToJsonArray #66425
  • Test failure: JIT/Methodical/NaN/intrinsic_nonf_il_r/intrinsic_nonf_il_r.sh #66424
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Avoid global:: qualifying all names in the Regex source generator #63512
    7.0.0
  • Move Regex source generator generated helper methods to a shared class #63502
    7.0.0
  • Update .NET 7 Unicode data to version 14.0.0 #44423
    7.0.0
  • Unable to work with PerformanceCounters when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65502
    6.0.4
  • ICorDebugProcess5::GetTypeFields with null layout returns E_POINTER #13500
    Future
  • ZipArchive corrupts files with unicode characters #65750
    7.0.0
  • Some System.IO tests failing with 'no space left on device' #66471
  • Use StartsWith literal optimization for OrdinalIgnoreCase in RegexCompiler / source generator #66324
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ReadJson<Hashtable> and <ArrayList> #66466
  • Timeout running `System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.CustomConverterTests.GetConverter_Poco_WriteThrowsNotSupportedException` on mono interpreter #66371
    7.0.0
  • DateOnly data type not resolved in net5.0 #66457
  • Behavior change of non strong named assembly resolution (vs. .NET Full Fw) #66451
  • Assert while running System.Net.Security tests #44689
    Future
  • System.Net.Security.Tests failure: malloc(): smallbin double linked list corrupted #30172
    Future
  • Failure processing application bundle. @area-Single-File #66442
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\StructABI\\structreturn\\structreturn.cmd #65942
    7.0.0
  • Language 'Norwegian' missing from drop-down in designer properties #66379
  • Validation of COM Host library scenarios #3452
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Illegal reordering of field read and call on implicit byref #66414
    7.0.0
  • Match_Timeout_Repetition_Throws(engine: NonBacktracking) timing out #65991
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Scale property for the decimal datatype #65074
  • The documentation for Environment.ProcessPath needs an update #66323
  • Review workaround for IsolatedStorageFile dependency on System.Security.Policy.Evidence #65930

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ConfigurationManager.Sources public #66485
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Fixing perf pipeline #66482
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add time prefix to (almost) all superpmi.py output #66481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [release/7.0-preview2] Backport `[wasm] Fix a race condition in adding payloads for helix` #66478
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-Build-mono
  • Add armv8l virtualized 32-bit ARM core detection #66477
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable emitting intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector<T> on arm64 #66476
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Update repo CMake configuration to target /W4 by default #66474
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Disable tests/profiler/eventpipe/eventpipe on JIT stress runs #66473
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add a flag to link against the system brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [metadata] Avoid realloc and memcpy when >1 gparams on generics #66458
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [draft] hot reload WIP #66455
    NO-MERGE, area-EnC-mono
  • Remove dotnet6 feeds #66447
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for the new WASM Exception Handling feature #66435
    area-Build-mono
  • Expose `LibraryImportAttribute` #66434
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove 4146 from libunwind #66427
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Add table of testing configurations #66347
  • Overhaul how regex generated code is structured #66432
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #66225
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Fix compatibility with NTLM authentication to McAfee Web Gateway #66315
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.4
  • Updating Unicode files to use 14.0.0 #66362
    area-System.Globalization
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Narrow for for Vector{64, 128} on Arm64 #66409
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Add intrinsics for several operators #66317
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [mono] Stop setting time_date_stamp field in MonoImage #66452
    tenet-performance, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use StartsWith(..., OrdinalIgnoreCase) in RegexCompiler / source generator #66339
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Enable/fix compiler warning 4996 in host #66431
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66301
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • Remove redundant allocations from JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter calls #65898
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Fix Queryable-to-Enumerable overload mapping logic #65857
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Linq, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [monoapi] Add mono_method_get_unmanaged_callers_only_ftnptr #66299
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64754
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Backport Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65537
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix stacktrace from DIM #65509
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #65372
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix r8->i conversion on amd64. #65329
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0] [mono][s390x] Fix OP_FCONV_TO_I and OP_RCONV_TO_I #65328
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.4
  • Remove null check that is used later to handle size request scenario. #66428
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Bump runtime workload manifest to 300 / update emsdk dependency #66373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.MAUI
  • Check gtClassProfileCandidateInfo before instrumentation #66388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable timing out test on mono #66381
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #66352
    area-codeflow
  • Clean up NonBacktracking DgmlWriter #66363
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Remove Unused Encoding on UriHelper #65330
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.4
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Backport skipping System.Text.Json tests for the aot configuration #66366
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.Json
  • Stop collecting disposables if changed token encountered #66265
    area-Extensions-Primitives, community-contribution
  • Remove asserts checking OpenSSL error queues #66443
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix random printf from JIT #66420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Do not mark implicit byrefs with GTF_GLOB_REF" #66415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the accounting for gen 1 allocations by taking into account what … #60248
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix implicit nullchecks for floats on arm64 #66413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add timestamp to some superpmi.py output #66437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retries to `dotnet restore` in SPMI collection of benchmarks #66433
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add tests for `comhost` with managed host #66360
    area-Host

Updated

  • Load C++/CLI DLLs in default ALC #66486
    area-Host
  • [release/5.0] Remove usages of native bootstrapping (#65901) #66406
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Port commits from PR-48140 to dotnet 5.0. #66087
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI]dotnet-podcast startup time and size measurements #65813
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Discard casts when storing normalize-on-load locals #66389
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Define SystemReflectionMetadataLoadContextVersion property for package references #65614
    area-Build-mono, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • A better fix for #66242 #66335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove _socket field from HttpConnection #66416
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations #65535
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonSerializer src-gen issues with reference handler feature #66422
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Refactor and improve MLL tests #66332
    area-Host
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reenable SslStreamNetworkStreamTests on OSX #66393
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Intrinsify Vector Dot product and Sum on Arm64 #66391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Abstractions` #65403
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Improve performance of decrypt one shots #65725
    area-System.Security
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Pass generic context when ldftn of generic method #66350
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Cleanup todo items from defines-todo.cmake #66408
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix incompatibility between runtime and nuget package #66295
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Dead code removal, minor fixes #66418
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix for number of used frame infos during crossgen2 compilation #64549
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable Fast Tail Call Optimization for ARM32 #66282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixes Binding to non-null IEnumerable doesn't work #36390 #66131
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Use ApiCompatTask in ApiCompat.proj #66073
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix #41618 Correct marshalling of SortKey objects on Linux #65548
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Add xarch `blsi` #66193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] struct casting #1865

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Could use a stub for __syscall_mprotect #1861

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] FlushProcessWriteBuffers to a NOP #1864

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support CT_INDIRECT calls #1863

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reenable WinMDInteropProjectCanBeReferenced test after suggested fixes #24326
  • SDL signoff requirements - please enable additional C/C++ compiler warnings #24325
  • MSBuildSdkResolver throws ArgumentException when solution path is an empty string #24320
  • `<GeneratePackageOnBuild>` causes `dotnet pack` to fail #24318
  • SDK 6.0.3 (6.0.201) is released, but https://aka.ms/dotnet/6.0/dotnet-sdk-linux-x64.tar.gz points to 6.0.103 #24317
  • Feature to add njsproj, vcxproject etc with dotnet sln command #24311
  • Building a solution with missing project reference should lead to error NU1104 #24309
  • No Ijwhost.dll when referencing C++/CLR NuGet package from .NET 6 C# app #24310
  • 'dotnet test' issues on AWS Graviton #24307

Closed

  • Detect if the SDK is being run on a CI host machine #23795
    6.0.3xx
  • Path.GetFullPath throws undocumented UnauthorizedAccessExceptions #24316

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge pull request #23302 from dotnet/marcpopMSFT-fixnet7condition #24328
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve error message for the case when Crossgen2 package is not present #24324
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24308
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #24282
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24304
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #24283
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24169
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24302
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: [FEATURE_NAME] #5909
  • Syntactic ambiguity with `..` in range, list-remainder, spread syntaxes, and what should we do about them. #5904

Updated

  • Champion "Query-foreach (`do` query termination)" #101
    Backlog
  • Support for method parameter names in nameof() #373
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Allow nameof(method parameter) outside the method. #4413
  • [Proposal]: Attributes on Main for top level programs #5045
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Proposal: list pattern #3435
    Working Set

PullRequests

Updated

  • Update ref field proposal #5899
  • Clarify binding rules for `await foreach` #5898

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Suboptimal codegen for the slice pattern in list pattern matching #60091
  • LSP requests compilation with full semantics when it should request frozen partial semantics #60089
  • Onboard to Helix Test Retry #60088
  • Add `-testUsedAssemblies` checks to a CI leg #60086
    Compiler.Next
  • Extra config options for `IDE0037` #60083
  • Remove the IOptionProvider and ExportGlobalOptionProvider from FeatureOnOffOptions #60082
  • Stack Trace Explorer isn't letting me go to async methods #60079
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa should target `net6.0-macos` #60078
  • Stack Trace Explorer breaks the ability to run other commands #60077

Closed

  • "CS7038: Failed to emit module" when using List Pattern Matching on custom type #60090
  • Integration tests fail to wait for code action application (or silent failure) #57327
    17.2
  • roslyn.visualstudio.integrationtests.visualbasic.basiclinecommit.commitonsave #59855
    17.2
  • EditorBrowsable is useless for source generators to hide stuff #60080
  • Compiling Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Emit.UnitTests.csproj results in CS8103 #60085
  • C#10 Improved Definite Assignment Analysis null-conditional operator change not properly version-gated #60084
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpRename.VerifyRenameInStandaloneFiles #60068
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens regex colorization incorrect #59731
    17.3
  • [Flaky test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpOutlining.OutliningConfigChange #60072

PullRequests

Created

  • [17.1 servicing] Update version of Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry #60096
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure generated trees have a full path #60095
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove unnecessary test method overrides #60094
    Area-IDE
  • Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation #60093
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust delegate caching logic for abstract statics. #60092
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Respond with updated diagnostics when EnC diagnostics state is different #60081
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Support consumption scenarios for checked user-defined operators #60032
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Fix support for OOP reporting diagnostics in source generated files #60016
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Port more flaky integration tests #59897
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Suppress file change notifications for VSFILECHG_Attr #60051
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Analyze flow in receiver of extension method group in delegate creation" #60087
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add details on validation related to EnC #60008
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update the standalone template file name for 17.2 #60074
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Move json serializer options out of mef constructed part to avoid loa… #60063
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #60011
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60076
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix transition for cancelled light bulb in integration tests #60034
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • WIP: Support smart pasting of contents into strings. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into CheckedUserDefinedOperators #60070
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • only include entry points defined in source #59836
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0 #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix handling for source generated documents in LSIF #59891
    Area-IDE
  • Validate with `-testUsedAssemblies` in a CI leg #60052
    Area-Compilers
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE
  • Apply source-build patches #58727
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make solution crawler and diagnostics options global #59800
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Make IdeAnalyzerOptions global #59657
    Area-IDE
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Stabilize light bulb #60048
    Area-IDE
  • Remove NuGet exception workaround #60055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Global indentation options #59679
    Area-IDE
  • Fix path to readme.md #60019
    Area-IDE
  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Fix binding order for Dispose in async foreach #60022
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams
  • Fix unnecessary assigment false positive for out argument #60062
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Option to always use default symbol servers for GTD #60053
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Error Boundary not triggered inside of EditForm Component #40649
  • Allow parameter and return types of route handler delegates (Minimal APIs) to contribute to endpoint metadata #40646
  • Clarification on AuthenticateResult.NoResult vs AuthenticateResult.Failure. 2nd iteration. #40645
  • IResult support in MVC #40639
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add a code analyzer to ensure that razor pages that define Dispose actually implement IDisposable #40638
  • Authorize attribute does not work #40632

Closed

  • Build template packages in servicing #40637
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute with UseStaticFiles results in wrong status code (200 OK) #40518
  • Quarantine StaticFiles.DefaultFilesMiddlewareTests.* #40642
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #40634
  • Connection fails on android (react-native) #40517
  • Not able to run Asp.net Core 6.0 Web API on IIS 10 Windows Server 2019 #40489
    Discussions
  • Potential regression in injection of IHttpContextAccessor in SignalR Hub.OnConnectedAsync #39095
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor InputFile: Cannot pick files more than once #40574
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Lack of proxy-protocol support prevents use of Kestrel with HAproxy in TCP mode #28526
    Backlog
  • Can't get RazorPageOptions from DI with version 6.0.3 of Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation #40609
  • Visual Studio React template project doesn't work with hook based components - Error: Invalid hook call #40631
  • Read request body multiple times #40635
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.Build.Framework, Version=15.1.0.0 #40417
  • Reactive HubConnectionState #40536
  • When MVC uses parameters to get submitted data, Request.Body cannot get the data. #40421

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix denial of service in ASP.NET Core via FormPipeReader #40648
    area-runtime
  • [Do not merge] Publish some installer artifacts for testing #40647
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix race condition when caching for a type of QueryParameterValueSupplier #40636
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Support tab characters in headers and unify validation code between servers #40633
    area-runtime

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40650
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Build ProjectTemplates in Source-Build #40643
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview3
  • `yarn upgrade` Packages #40641

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Controls aligned to right are cropped on Android #5214
  • [Bug] Menu missing accelerators #5211
  • [Bug] Menus doesn't render in Shell if not part of Shell #5210
  • XAML Hot Reload: need notification when element is rendered differently and/or in a different location #5204
  • Android: IWindow.VisualDiagnosticsOverlay gets cleared when changing element properties #5202
  • Blur event get invoked when focusing the input element #5201
  • Add BlazorWebView breaking changes to preview 14 readme #5200
  • MAUI missing net6.0-ios #5199
  • Mac Catalyst Publish Failure #5197
  • [iOS]BackButtonBehavior IsEnabled="False" does not Disable the back button on iOS #5195
  • Shell.SetBackButtonBehavior TextOverride removes the text instead of replacing it #5193
  • Pangesture does not trigger exit/completed/cancel event while pan moves outside of the layout/control #5191
  • Windows ScrollView does not pass touch to parent pan gesture when scroll using screen touch #5189
  • Blazor MAUI <select> element - events not occurring #5188
  • [Android] Receives the scrolled notification after some delay in horizontal scrolling #5187
  • [WinUI]Crashing issue when minimizing the app window #5184
  • Build error for Maui App icon svg format is not supported in iOS plaftform #5180
  • Application.Current.RequestedTheme fails on WinUI with an AV #5179

Closed

  • [Android] Shell AppBar Title is set and read aloud twice #5105
  • The App using Shell always have App Name as default title. #4310
  • [Bug] [Android] Title of Shell initially not set to correct value #3382
  • Span bindings are ignored when properties are changed #4901
  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform always returns 0 on Android #5169
  • [Bug] Missing SetMenu implementation on ContentPage #1386
  • The Shell.TitleView is not visible on Android and does not fill Navigation Bar on iOS #5194
  • Default MAUI App takes 14 seconds to open on iOS. #5183
  • [Bug] Starting app with RTL language doesn't currently work #2258
  • Warning NU1703 only for net6.0-maccatalyst when adding package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer #4252
  • [Android] Frame content have a wrong size #4076
  • OnPlatform could be simplified at build time #4716
  • [Bug] Platform Extensions are not working on Android #3346
  • System.TypeLoadException: VTable setup of type BindableObject failed #3501
  • Package update fails for non Android projects #3490
  • Device.Info.ScaledScreenSize Interface alternatives #3875
  • [Windows] Shell AppBar is empty but reads oddly with Narrator #5106
  • Control Pressed and Release and VisualState Groups do not behave as expected. #5104
  • [Bug] Windows button rollover doesn't update on rollout #4935
  • [Android] CarouselView infinite loading loop when height or width are unbounded #4082
  • [iOS] Grid children's position update not working in load time #3510
  • [WinUI] Parent measure override not called while children collection change in dynamic time #3512
  • IContentView measure and arrange getting called continuously for same values #3670
  • Native iOS Application Build broken when referencing iOs libraries #4334

PullRequests

Created

  • Lazy Load Shell Flyout and Bottom Tabs #5215
  • Multiple DispatcherProviders are being created #5213
  • Fix Blazor Hybrid page reloading #5212
  • RTL FlowDirection fix for Windows #5205
    area/layout 🔲
  • [WIP] Improve Glide usage for Image Loading on Android #5198
  • [Controls] Use interface on mappers for shapes #5196
  • [X] Compile CornerRadiusTypeConversion #5192
    area/Xaml </>
  • Implement Path RenderTransform property #5190
    area/drawing ✏️
  • Add IWindow.DisplayDensity #5185
  • [ios] Fix initial time being wrong for TimePicker #5182
    control-datetimepicker
  • [ios] Fix initial date being wrong for datepicker #5181
    control-datetimepicker

Merged

  • Fix Shell Title Calculation #5113
    area/shell 🐢
  • Fire Navigated After Loaded #5207
  • Remove IsIdentity check for View Matrix, but keep null check #5206
  • Remove Removing Adorners when updating Views (All Platforms) #5203
  • [X] Simplify OnPlatformExtension #4829
    area/Xaml </>
  • [android] update built-in AOT profiles #5171
  • Fix Visibility of header elements if they have no content #5152
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix Button incorrect VisualStates #5122
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [msbuild] %(MauiXaml.SubType) defaults to Designer #5176
  • CarouselView fix measure for CarouselView.Loop #5077
    area/layout 🔲, area/collectionview 📃
  • Implement FillRule property in PolygonHandler and PolylineHandler #5166
    area/drawing ✏️

Updated

  • [dualscreen] project/nuget for Surface Duo and other Android foldables #5020
    area/controls 🎮, control-dualscreen
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • Move `UseMauiApp` call into "Controls" #5174
  • Set the date after the DatePickerDialog is shown #5173
    control-datetimepicker
  • [WIP] Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
  • BlazorWebView: Allow for WPF and WinForms WebView2 Custom Startup Settings and Fixed Distribution Mode #5086
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Mark all the Device [Obsolete] #5088
  • Fix Android crashing issue #4860
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, high
  • [iOS] Update SearchBar TextColor property if TraitCollection changes #5004
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TableBuilder config ignored on derived entity types in a TPH hierarchy #27620
  • PK with HasColumnType generates strange migration for Owned Types #27619
  • The global interceptor must take effect under the DbContext #27612
  • InMemory generates and assigns Id before SaveChanges #27611
  • Invalid SQL query gets generated when checking for null in LINQ #27609
  • ToTable(b => {}) should map the entity type to the default table #27608

Closed

  • Payload contains two App.deps.json #27576
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite.SqliteException (0x80004005): SQLite Error 15: 'locking protocol'. #27603
  • Regression in how model objects are initialized when fetched by DbContext #27613
  • Help in getting a custom IServiceProvider working with the NodaTime NuGet package. #27566
  • IsTemporal() with SetIsMemoryOptimized(true) generates invalid CREATE TABLE #27592
    7.0.0
  • Tracked Entity remains allocated until new request #21092
  • Collapse some `closed-` labels #27582
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes to support multi-dimensional arrays #27618
  • Fix scaffolding of reference navigations with NRT #27616
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27615
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27614
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Fix SQL Server memory-optimized + temporal tables #27610
    auto-merge
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27594
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27595
  • feat (codespaces) - Add initial support for codespaces #27483
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Refactor ReaderModificationCommandBatch #27584
  • Stop deleting orphans for optional relationships configured for cascade deletes #27557
    breaking-change
  • Improve SQL Server insertion logic and other update pipeline optimizations #27573
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27593
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
